Text.Page:
Mission Orders

! Good news. Once you have completed your current mission, come find me in Tulufan. I have some good news from Velika for you.

-Baruch

Having annihilated the Lok believers, you returned to Velika.

Commander Seir organized a ceremony to celebrate your achievements, and Elleon complimented you for playing a pivotal role in bringing down the Scions of Lok.

There you are! Glad to see you made it back.

Velika's planned an event to celebrate the defeat of the Scions of Lok! They want you there right away. Troius will be waiting for you at the pegasus platform.
<PCNAME>, I heard about how you helped Elleon. Tremendous job! You have to tell Uriela you're here. She wanted to talk to you.

! Everyone's talking about your gallantry and heroism today!

Commander Seir is waiting for you inside.

You've done great work, ! Your toppling the Scions of Lok—again—is no mean feat.

We are proud to have you in our ranks. You're a credit to the service and the entire federation! Elleon is looking for you as well. Don't keep him waiting.

It's hard to chastise a hero for being late to their own celebration, though we were thinking of ways to try!

Come! Let's not keep Seir waiting any longer. He so adores this sort of thing.

Your courage helped uncover the traitorous Samael, the insidious Scions of Lok, and not one, but two threats to kill Velik.

The Valkyon Federation is still in danger—our work is never done, but with allies like you, we can dream of a brighter future. It's been a tremendous honor to work with you, . We shall, as always, remember.
